configuration.description: Dashboard de resultados del servicio de optimizacion - 4 estados tipo-especificos

settings.markdownTextFunction:
var lastRun = data['opt_last_run'] || '--';var ago = '--';if (lastRun && lastRun !== '--') { try { var d = new Date(lastRun); var now = new Date(); var diff = Math.floor((now - d) / 60000); if (diff < 60) ago = diff + ' min'; else if (diff < 1440) ago = Math.floor(diff/60) + ' h'; else ago = Math.floor(diff/1440) + ' d'; } catch(e) { ago = '--'; }}return '

Centro de Optimizacion

Analisis y recomendaciones del servicio de optimizacion
Ultima ejecucion
hace '+ago+'
RT 5min
Horario
Diario 6AM
Semanal Lun
Mensual D1
';

var result=0;var count=0;var values=data.filter(function(d){return d['opt_potential_gain_bpd']!==undefined&&d['opt_potential_gain_bpd']!==null&&d['opt_potential_gain_bpd']!=='';});for(var i=0;i0?result.toFixed(0):'--';return '
trending_up
Ganancia Total Campo
'+display+' BPD
';

var result=0;var count=0;for(var i=0;i0){result+=v;count++;}}var display=count>0?(result/count).toFixed(1):'--';return '
favorite
Salud Promedio
'+display+' /100

var result=0;var count=0;for(var i=0;i0){result+=v;count++;}}var display=count>0?(result/count).toFixed(1):'--';return '

var result=0;var count=0;var values=data.filter(function(d){return d['opt_current_rate_bpd']!==undefined&&d['opt_current_rate_bpd']!==null&&d['opt_current_rate_bpd']!=='';});for(var i=0;i0?result.toFixed(0):'--';return '

var result=0;var count=0;var values=data.filter(function(d){return d['opt_recommended_rate_bpd']!==undefined&&d['opt_recommended_rate_bpd']!==null&&d['opt_recommended_rate_bpd']!=='';});for(var i=0;i0?result.toFixed(0):'--';return '

settings.cellContentFunction:
var colors = {'ESP':'#4CAF50','SRP':'#2196F3','PCP':'#FF9800','gas_lift':'#9C27B0','Gas Lift':'#9C27B0'};var labels = {'ESP':'ESP','SRP':'SRP','PCP':'PCP','gas_lift':'Gas Lift','Gas Lift':'Gas Lift'};var c = colors[value] || '#607D8B'; var l = labels[value] || value;return '
'+l+'
';

settings.cellStyleFunction: if (!value || value === '' || value === '0') return {color: '#9FA6B4', fontStyle: 'italic'};var styles = {'optimized': {backgroundColor:'#E8F5E9',color:'#4CAF50',fontWeight:'600',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'},'optimal': {backgroundColor:'#E8F5E9',color:'#4CAF50',fontWeight:'600',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'},'pending': {backgroundColor:'#FFF3E0',color:'#FF9800',fontWeight:'600',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'},'error': {backgroundColor:'#FFEBEE',color:'#F44336',fontWeight:'600',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'},'not_analyzed': {color:'#9FA6B4',fontStyle:'italic'},'suboptimal': {backgroundColor:'#FFEBEE',color:'#F44336',fontWeight:'600',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'},'critical': {backgroundColor:'#B71C1C',color:'#FFFFFF',fontWeight:'700',borderRadius:'4px',padding:'2px 8px'}}; return styles[value] || {color: '#4B535B'};

var score = Number(value);if (isNaN(score) || score === 0) return {color: '#9FA6B4', fontStyle: 'italic'};if (score >= 80) return {backgroundColor: '#E8F5E9', color: '#4CAF50', fontWeight: '600', borderRadius: '4px', padding: '2px 8px'};if (score >= 60) return {backgroundColor: '#FFF3E0', color: '#FF9800', fontWeight: '600', borderRadius: '4px', padding: '2px 8px'};return {backgroundColor: '#FFEBEE', color: '#F44336', fontWeight: '600', borderRadius: '4px', padding: '2px 8px'};

settings.cellContentFunction: if (!value || value === '' || value === '0' || value === 0) return 'Sin recomendacion';var icons = {'increase_frequency': '▲ Aumentar frecuencia','increase_vsd_frequency': '▲ Aumentar VSD Hz','decrease_frequency': '▼ Reducir frecuencia','decrease_vsd_frequency': '▼ Reducir VSD Hz','increase_spm': '▲ Aumentar SPM','decrease_spm': '▼ Reducir SPM','increase_injection': '▲ Aumentar inyeccion','decrease_injection': '▼ Reducir inyeccion','adjust_gas_injection': '🔄 Ajustar inyeccion GL','increase_speed': '▲ Aumentar RPM','increase_rpm': '▲ Aumentar RPM','decrease_speed': '▼ Reducir RPM','decrease_rpm': '▼ Reducir RPM','workover': '🔧 Workover requerido','review_gaslift': '🔄 Revisar inyeccion GL','monitor': '👁 Monitorear','no_action': '✔ Sin accion necesaria'}; return icons[value] || '' + value + '';

settings.cellStyleFunction: var v = Number(value);if (isNaN(v) || v === 0) return {color: '#9FA6B4'};if (v > 100) return {color: '#4CAF50', fontWeight: '700'};if (v > 0) return {color: '#4CAF50', fontWeight: '600'};return {color: '#F44336', fontWeight: '600'};

actionCellButton.name: Ver Detalle

settings.markdownTextFunction:
var good=0,med=0,low=0,crit=0,total=0;for (var i=0; i 0) { total++; if (v >= 80) good++; else if (v >= 60) med++; else if (v >= 40) low++; else crit++; }}return '

Distribucion de Salud del Campo

'+good+'
OPTIMO (>80)
'+med+'
SUBOPTIMO (60-80)
'+low+'
ATENCION (40-60)
'+crit+'
CRITICO (<40)
Total: '+total+' pozos evaluados
';

settings.cellContentFunction:
var colors = {'ESP':'#4CAF50','SRP':'#2196F3','PCP':'#FF9800','gas_lift':'#9C27B0','Gas Lift':'#9C27B0'};var labels = {'ESP':'ESP','SRP':'SRP','PCP':'PCP','gas_lift':'Gas Lift','Gas Lift':'Gas Lift'};var c = colors[value] || '#607D8B'; var l = labels[value] || value;return '
'+l+'
';

settings.cellStyleFunction: var v = Number(value);if (isNaN(v) || v === 0) return {color: '#9FA6B4'};if (v > 100) return {color: '#4CAF50', fontWeight: '700'};if (v > 0) return {color: '#4CAF50', fontWeight: '600'};return {color: '#F44336', fontWeight: '600'};

settings.cellContentFunction: if (!value || value === '' || value === '0' || value === 0) return 'Sin recomendacion';var icons = {'increase_frequency': '▲ Aumentar frecuencia','increase_vsd_frequency': '▲ Aumentar VSD Hz','decrease_frequency': '▼ Reducir frecuencia','decrease_vsd_frequency': '▼ Reducir VSD Hz','increase_spm': '▲ Aumentar SPM','decrease_spm': '▼ Reducir SPM','increase_injection': '▲ Aumentar inyeccion','decrease_injection': '▼ Reducir inyeccion','adjust_gas_injection': '🔄 Ajustar inyeccion GL','increase_speed': '▲ Aumentar RPM','increase_rpm': '▲ Aumentar RPM','decrease_speed': '▼ Reducir RPM','decrease_rpm': '▼ Reducir RPM','workover': '🔧 Workover requerido','review_gaslift': '🔄 Revisar inyeccion GL','monitor': '👁 Monitorear','no_action': '✔ Sin accion necesaria'}; return icons[value] || '' + value + '';
